name: Pixpi
description:
Play to beat the score on the endless mode, play to complete all levels, play to unlock all skins, play to KILL time!

Platformer - Arcade game where you drop to infinity, evading bombs and other traps while trying to beat the Highscore!

Free Arcade Fun! Beat the Score!

Evade bombs, all kind of cubes, lasers and more traps in this fun and challenging game!
You can challenge your friends to see who finishes all levels first and who gets the highest score on the endless mode!

Made with GameMaker Studio.
